Hmmm. There is a domain name guoan.com.cn, but no website.
There is a company Guoyan - but in any case "Engr. Alvin Zhang" isn't Alvin, or Zhang, and has nothing to do with any Chinese company. But you knew that.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhang


This may be of interest. We have a business unit in Warm Springs, (Climax, Nevada)  which may be able to perform this task for you. It is something we have some experience of here in SA. My contact details are as below as I will have to see more details of the proposed modalities and show my Financial Director Mr Bernard Madoff.


I am 56 and CEO.


T


Lonslo Tossov 
Tossov Investments SA  
1 Yanker Ave,  
Mbalongawank 123  
Via Costeira - Natal  
Phone/Fax: +55 (84) 202.1300  
http://www.freewebs.com/tossovinvestments

messages.subject: CITIC GUOAN GROUP CHINA
messages.body:
Payment Receiver Officer,


Thank you very much for your response and your interest in this transaction. We appreciate the fact that you are ready to represent this company in your country. 


You should not have anything to worry about as there shall be no financial requirements from your side.


COMPANY BRIEF HISTORY:  
CITIC GUOAN GROUP Ltd company was established in 2005 and also Registered with the chinese Government and the Company is based in China.


PAYMENT METHODS: By Cheque  


Please Verify This Informations Of Yours Below And State The Country You Are From; 


Lonslo Tossov 
1 Yanker Ave,  
Mbalongawank 123  
Via Costeira - Natal 
Country : 
Phone/Fax: +55 (84) 202.1300 
56years 
CEO Of Tossov Investments SA


And your work as our Payment Receiver Officer is to Receive the Cheque And Have The Cheque Deposited Into Your Bank Account And Wait For The Clearance Date(Availability Of Funds To You) and then Withdrawn the Payment from your Bank Account And deduct your percentage (10%) from it and the balance made payable in to our designated account outside china that will be availed to you later.


However, you are to provide us with any form of identification(scanned drivers license or international passport).


These should be sent via email. 


An acknowledgement of this mail would be appreciated. Thank you once again.


Your Sincerly    
  Engr.Alvin Zhang(CEO). 
  CITIC GUOAN GROUP. 
  www.guoan.com.cn

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhang


Thank you for replying so quickly. After some thought and hesitation I have decided to send a scan of my passport, but with some details obscured for reasons of confidentiality. Sending personal documents in this way is rather unorthodox, for one never knows exactly what security arrangements are in place at the other end. I know that here we have problems with sticky-handed natives all the time what with a constant depletion of the stationary cupboard, cigars missing from my desk, executive toilet rolls misappropriated and so on.


Mr Madoff at our end has asked for some corresponding proof of identity from yourselves, perhaps from the payment officer, which I am sure will not be a problem.


Once the formalities are out of the way, how soon can we expect to start the business? I am asking as I have to be away for a few days shortly at the Smegaroon Golf Tourney. We sponsor Ginger Merkin, the local favourite, and I want to be at his side for photography as he tees off.


You have my details correct.


Lonslo


Lonslo Tossov  
Tossov Investments SA 


PS As previously mentioned we are based in South Africa with a USA office.
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

messages.body:
Payment Receiver Officer,


I Must Thank You With The Way You Are Responding And Your America Details That The Cheque Will Be Issued To,The America Details Is Well Acknowledged.


I Will Notify You When My Customer Initiate The Payment By Cheque To This Details Below;


 Tossov Investments (USA) Inc 
69, Bushey Park View 
Warm Springs 
Climax 
Nevada 
NV 41956


c/o Jackie Lation


He is 49. 
Occupation: financial co-ordinator 
Telephone (602) 728-3241


Meanwhile A New Customer Just Notify Me Of Making Payment Tomorrow 11th August 2010 And This New Customer Says He Will Be Initiating The Payment As Wire Transfer From His Home Equilty Line Of Credit(Heloc) Into Your Own Home Equilty Line Of Credit(Heloc) So You Are To Fill The Details Below For This New Payment Tomorrow So That Means You Will Be Expecting Two Payments(One By Cheque And The Second Via My New Customer Home Equilty Line Of Credit(Heloc) Into Your Own  America Home Equilty Line Of Credit(Heloc).


As You Are Not In United States Of America,You Can Instruct Your Financial Co-ordinator( Jackie Lation) To Fill The Informations Below For This Urgent Payment Tomorrow.


 1)Are you a property owner in the united states    YES/NO
2)Do you have an existing Home Equity line of Credit with a Bank or other financial institution in the united states     YES/NO

3)Is your Equity Line of Credit HELOC still Open  YES/NO

4) Social Security Number  : NEVER SEND YOUR SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER!

5)How much do you currently owe on your Line of Credit:   $........

6)What is the total Credit Limit on your Line of Credit :    $.............

7)How long have you had your line of Credit  ..........Years

8)What is your Home Equity Line of Credit(HELOC)Account Number And Not Ordinary Bank Account Number : 

9)What Financial Institution is your line of Credit with: 

10) Bank Contact Address :  

11) What is the property Address that secure Your line of Credit:

12) What is Your Mother's Maiden Name : 

13) Bank Toll Free Number :


An acknowledgement of this mail would be appreciated. Thank you once again.


Your Sincerly   
  Engr.Alvin Zhang(CEO).
  CITIC GUOAN GROUP.
  www.guoan.com.cn

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhang


I am pleased that matters are proceeding quickly to Climax. It will be satisfying when done.


I am not sure that the information you ask is relevant and and do not know why it is required. Mr Jackie Lation is a paid employee of this company and surely such personal details are hardly relevant to business contracted to him on our behalf? It would be highly irregular. I have asked our HR Manager here, Mr Ivor Bonar, and he agrees that he has hardly known it come up before now.

 
 
TOSSOV
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Payment Receiver Officer,


This Is To Acknowledged Your Complete Informations And I Have Forwarded It To My Customer Who Want To Make Payment,So Immediately He Initiate The Payment By Cheque,I Will Notify You In Other For You To Notify Your Employee In Climax Neveda To Be Expecting It And As Soon As He Receive The Cheque He Will Deposite It Into Your Company Bank Account In Climax Neveda For Clearance And Immediately It Clear You Will Take Away Your 10% As Your Entitlement And Send The Balance 90% To A Designated Bank Account I Will Avail To You Later.


An acknowledgement of this mail would be appreciated. Thank you once again.


Your Sincerly    
  Engr.Alvin Zhang(CEO). 
  CITIC GUOAN GROUP. 
  www.guoan.com.cn

Tossov

How Are You Doing Today???


I Am Not Happy At All,My Customer Just Contacted Me With Annoyance That The Telephone Number :  (602) 728-3241  c/o Jackie Lation Did Not Go Through Because My Customer Said He Has Already Issue The Cheque On Tossov Investments (USA) Inc And He Just Wanted To Speak With Lation Before Sending The Cheque To Him,But The Telephone Number Did Not Go Through,So I Need A Valid Cell Phone Number That Any Time My Customer Decide To Contact Mr Lation,He Will Pick Up The Call.


An acknowledgement of this mail would be appreciated. Thank you once again.


Your Sincerly    
  Engr.Alvin Zhang(CEO). 
  CITIC GUOAN GROUP. 
  www.guoan.com.cn

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhang


This is splendid news. I hope and trust it was sent by secure courier service?


As soon as your little package comes we shall act upon it. The thrust of our business is always to give full satisfaction.


Feel free to suggest any further business we can help you with. 


Kind regards

 
Tossov

Dear Mr Zhang


Apologies for the delay. I was awaiting a confirmation from our Climax office of the arrival of your cheque.


Mr Lation says he thinks it has just been received and will be deposited shortly. We are all very impressed by your efficiency I can tell you. Business intercourse is made all the more satisfying by such professionalism.


Lonslo

I Must Thank You For Your Co Operation So Far.Immediately The Funds Is Made Available To Your Company By The Bank Today As Stated By Mr Jackie Lation,Kindly Take Away Your 10% As Your Entitlement Out Of The Total Funds Received And Transfer The Balance 90%To The Account Details Below;

BANK : CITIBANK
BANK ADDRESS: AL WASL BRANCH BUR-DUBAI,DUBAI,U.A.E
SWIFT CODE: CITIAEAD
A/C NAME: PAKTEL INTERNATIONAL TRADING LLC
A/C NUMBER: 061101958412

Immediately You Transfer The Balance Funds(90%) To The Bank Account Detail Above Today Do Scan And Send Me A Copy Of The Bank Telex Confirmation Transfer Payment Slip For Confirmation.

An acknowledgement of this mail would be appreciated. Thank you once again.

messages.body:

This will have to be done next week. Unfortunately, our Climax office is closed monday due to a staff training day and some staff are on vacation. But we are looking for Jackie Lation, and will endeavour to firm things up as soon as possible.

 
Tossov

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhang


Our apologies for the delay in making quick response to your three last mails. Our communications officer this end, Eric Shun, was trying to get Jackie Lation to come on the phone, but it proved a little too hard. 


However, he now tells me all is in hand and there should be no more drawbacks. Have you received the scan copy yet? 

 
Tossov

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhan


Have you had Jackie Lation very recently either on the phone or via email? He assures me that he sent the paperwork personally. Normally it is transmitted automatically, but since we are running late and you have sent so many messages (4 or 5 today) to ensure your satsifaction it was a hand job.


I hope that it has come out well.


Please confirm

 
Tossov

messages.body:
Payment Receiver Officer,


Please And Please Send Me The Scan Copy Of The Bank Telex Confirmation Transfer Payment Slip Of $828,000(90%) Today,Please And Please I Am Pleading With You To Please Scan And Send Me The Transfer Slip You Use In Transfering The Balance 90% Into The Dubai Bank Account Detail I Already Sent To You As This Issue Is Causing Serious Trouble Among The Board Of Directors And Board Of Trustees.


Your Delay In Sending The Scan Copy Of The Bank Telex Confirmation Transfer Payment Slip Of $828,000(90%) Is Also Delaying The Initiation Of The Second Batch Payment Of $1,250,000 And I Am Not Happy With The Way You Are Handling This Issue.

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhan


Please stop this begging and whining tone, it is most unbusiness-like!


Mr Jackie Lation has told me quite firmly that he has got it off. Once indeed, directly by hand as a special favour. Those in Climax ough to know, after all. If you cannot locate its arrival your end then we cannot be held responsible. I hope this is not a mess we are expected to clear up.


Tossov

T

messages.body:
Dear Mr Zhang


I am sorry that you feel that way. I have checked with our Climax office this morning and it appears that Jackie Lation has not been feeling himself of late, due to a vaccination he had some days ago in prepartion for a business trip. It is unusual for him to complain of such a little prick, but these things happen. He felt listless and limp performing his duties, I'm told and so it may have effected his efficiency in these matters.


Do you still wish to continue in this matter? 


T 





 




scamorama main street 
* 
get booked 
*
messages.raw:
Lonslo Tossov

Dear Mr Zhang

I am sorry that you feel that way. I have checked with our Climax office this morning and it appears that Jackie Lation has not been feeling himself of late, due to a vaccination he had some days ago in prepartion for a business trip. It is unusual for him to complain of such a little prick, but these things happen. He felt listless and limp performing his duties, I'm told and so it may have effected his efficiency in these matters.

Do you still wish to continue in this matter?

T

But he didn't...

 

scamorama main street * get booked *
